Created attachment 34935
SearchWithoutRegEx

Replace All not working.

Steps to reproduce :

1.Open the script 
2.Type the string with or with out selecting the Regular exp  and  hit Search/Search & Expand . Search properly.
3.Now enter the String in "Replace by" field and hit Replace All doesn't replace with the string
creator: rajani_gade@yahoo.com

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Hello,
ReplaceAll does not do replacement on all elements as per release notes:
"A replace feature has been added to Search feature to allow replacement in some elements."


This surely requires more documentation.

HeaderManager:
- Replacement in values

Http Request:
- Replacement in Arguments
- Replacement in Path
- Replacement in Host

Does you bug concern any of these elements ?

Thanks

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text: *** Bug 61016 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

creator: rajani_gade@yahoo.com
text:
Hi  Philippe,

Yes  it's working for the below. I thought Replace All works for any thing any where. If we would have that feature it will be nice.And as you said  probably requires more documentation.

HeaderManager:
- Replacement in values

Http Request:
- Replacement in Arguments
- Replacement in Path
- Replacement in Host


Thank you so much for the quick response and clarification!

Thanks,
